item.title: Matrix Synapse SAML2 Login
item.description: NOTE This is a very rough write-up on how to use Keycloak SAML2 with a Matrix Synapse Homeserver for user authentication. Keep in mind that not all points outlined here may 100% work for you and “turning and changing” some parameters may be needed to get it working for your setup. Intro This blog post is especially made for Keycloak SAML 2.0 SSO with Matrix with the GitHub matrix-org/synapse - Complete the SAML2 implementation #5422, which is based on my draft PR GitHub matrix-org/synapse - SAML2 Improvements and redirect stuff #5316.
